page.title: 15CHILDREN'S CLUBS
page.content: The children of Kippen have a lot to do in the evenings.There is a{Brownie pack run by Mrs.Anderson in the school hall every Wednesday at 6.00p.m. {Guides}run by Mrs.Burnett and Mrs. Wright also meet at the school each Wednesday evening after the Brownies.The boys have{Boy's Brigade each Thursday from 7.00p.m.-9.00p.m. run by Miss Dunlop and Mr.Fulton,and for the older ones there is the{Youth {Club}which meets each Monday evening.There is also{gymnastics}on a Monday in the school hall.
